key.blockoffensive.open.shop.failed.no_m: Cannot open the store because you have not joined any maps
key.blockoffensive.open.shop.failed.game: Cannot open the store because game not started
key.blockoffensive.open.shop.failed.purc: Cannot open the store because purchase time expired
key.blockoffensive.open.shop.failed.left: Cannot open the store because left purchase area
key.blockoffensive.open.shop.failed.game: Cannot open the store because joined game does not support store
blockoffensive.screen.scale.warm:
Before using Block Offensive Mod, please check : 
 Settings -> Video Settings -> Interface Scale to ensure it is between 1 and 4, not set to automatic.
blockoffensive.screen.scale.warm.tips:
If the store still displays abnormally after opening,
 try adjusting the size of your Minecraft window and reopening the store. You can then revert to fullscreen or another size afterward.
blockoffensive.item.c4.use.fail.notInAre: You are not in the designated bombing area!
blockoffensive.item.c4.use.fail.noMap: You can't place bombs because you haven't joined a blast mode map!
blockoffensive.item.c4.use.fail.map.notS: You can't place bombs because the game hasn't started yet!
blockoffensive.item.c4.use.fail.team.not: You can't place bombs because you haven't joined a team!
blockoffensive.login.message.closeable: This information can be disabled in config
blockoffensive.map.cs.wip.fail: This feature has not been implemented yet, please wait for future version updates!
blockoffensive.map.cs.pause.fail: The game has not started yet or has already exhausted the number of pauses or is it already in a paused state
blockoffensive.map.cs.pause.nextRound.su: The pause status will take effect in the next round!
blockoffensive.map.cs.pause.success: The current game is set to pause state
blockoffensive.map.cs.pause.now: The current game is pause state
blockoffensive.map.cs.pause.done: The pause time has been exhausted
blockoffensive.map.vote.success: The %1$s vote was successful, the map will be execute some logic.
blockoffensive.map.vote.fail: The %1$s vote failed, the map will not be changed.
blockoffensive.map.vote.help: You can type [ .a or .da ] OR [/cs2 a or /cs2 da] in the chat box to agree or disagree with the vote.
blockoffensive.map.cs.auto.start.message: This game will start in %1$s seconds
blockoffensive.map.cs.auto.start.title: %1$s seconds
command.cs.noMap: You have not joined any CS maps.
